title: The Hadra
description: This third book in Diana Rivers's critically acclaimed series chronicles the further adventures of that fiercely proud tribe of women, the Khal Hadera Lossien. Engrossing, sensual, and rich with detail, Rivers's storytelling leaves us truly believing in this fantasy tribe of lesbian warriors. The Hadra picks up where Daughters of the Great Star ends, and ends where Journey to Zelindar begins.
author: Diana Rivers
